named-query.name: FormaPgto.findAllByParameters
named-query.query: select o from FormaPgto o where (:id is NULL or o.id = :id) and (:descricao is NULL or upper(o.descricao) like :descricao) and (:empresa is NULL or o.empresa = :empresa) ORDER BY o.descricao

named-query.name: FormaPgto.findQuantityAllByParameters
named-query.query: select count(o.id) from FormaPgto o where (:id is NULL or o.id = :id) and (:descricao is NULL or upper(o.descricao) like :descricao) and (:empresa is NULL or o.empresa = :empresa) ORDER BY o.descricao
